title: [Self-Directed] Instructional Design Strategies Using Predictive Analytics in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and instructional design experience
context.additional_context: Conducts projects for pre-service/in-service teachers to improve educational effectiveness through online learning data analysis

learning_goals: Collecting and interpreting online learning engagement data using learning analytics tools (Moodle, etc.)
Based on predictive analytics models, factors contributing to learners' academic decline can be diagnosed, and customized intervention strategies can be designed.
Through PBL projects, an instructional design plan integrating technical competencies (digital tool utilization) and self-directed learning strategies can be developed.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
